mainText:
I was a total PC fan, and never understood Apple fans. Reading a bit 
about what Steve was doing to Apple two years ago, I thought to myself 
"There must be something I am missing, and as a teacher I need to 
understand why some people are so fond of these machines". And it 
started with an offer for an iMac. The seller told me "Once you start with this, there is no return. You 
will not want to go back to a PC". How right he was!
I am now mainly using Apple, only turning to a PC notebook due to me 
teaching in that environment. Sad to have missed so many years of what 
Steve had been producing together with all you Apple people.

He will certainly be missed, but definitly not forgotten. His legacy is 
with you people. Make him proud.

WIth my deepest sympathy to all the Jobs family and the Apple family
author: Andres
